name: Jeff: The Hungry Fish
description:
Jeff: The Hungry Fish is a single-player mode aquatic themed arcade-style game where you eat and devour to rise above the food chain.

Play as Jeff, a small fish hungry to take on the entire sea. Swim through areas and prey on fish smaller than you. Get bigger the more you devour and move on to the next area, in search of more prey. Become the apex predator of the ocean.

But it’s not that easy. You start as a mere prey and as you grow, there will still be bigger and more dangerous fish out there. Maneuver and evade them until you’re big enough to eat them instead. And remember, there’s always a bigger fish.

Key Features

Eat-and-Grow to Advance
• Progress your way into becoming the biggest and the baddest fish in the ocean.

Gradually Increasing Difficulty
• Prepare yourself for bigger challenges as you descend further into different areas.

Test Your Knowledge on Marine Life!
• Find submerged maps as you explore the area which will prompt a question that will reward you with progress points if you answer correctly.
